mapper.insert: insert into operation_record (related_id, operation_type, operation_content, operation_reason) values (#{relatedId},#{operationType},#{operationContent},#{operationReason})

insert into operation_record (related_id, operation_type, operation_content, operation_reason) values
( #{record.relatedId}, #{record.operationType}, #{record.operationContent}, #{record.operationReason} )
mapper.update: update operation_record set status = 'N' where related_id = #{projectId} and operation_type < 100
mapper.select: select operation_type as operationType, operation_content as operationContent, operation_reason as reason, operation_time as operationTime, operation_executor_id as operationExecutorId from operation_record where related_id = #{projectId} and `status` = 'Y' order by operation_time
